tooltip.oretopia.romiumsword: §7This was definitely the same sword they used in Wallachia.
tooltip.oretopia.romiumaxe: §7Dont even bother using this in axe pvp.
tooltip.oretopia.uraniumore: §7The famous radioactive ore, surrounded by the most basic thing, stone.
tooltip.oretopia.rawuranium: §7A highly radioactive metal used at least in this mod to make explosives. I wouldn't recommend holding it because of the radiation but who cares its minecraft!
tooltip.oretopia.uranium: §7A piece of uranium metal that is still dangerous but not enriched yet.
tooltip.oretopia.enricheduranium: §7Woah, now that's some deadly stuff. Also how are you still alive right now?
tooltip.oretopia.copper: §7A rather soft metal that is very conductive.
tooltip.oretopia.coppernugget: §7Its kinda just a small piece of copper, don't know what you need it for.
tooltip.oretopia.coppersword: §7You have a higher chance at getting struck by lightning than winning a pvp battle with this.
tooltip.oretopia.copperaxe: §7Eh, it works... not for that long though.
tooltip.oretopia.copperhoe: §7Really? Out of all the things you could make a hoe with you chose copper?
tooltip.oretopia.copperpickaxe: §7Be grateful this thing can even mine.
tooltip.oretopia.coppershovel: §7Careful, don't dig into any wires now!
tooltip.oretopia.tungstenore: §7So tough it wants to generate next to some lava.
tooltip.oretopia.tungsten:
§7A metal so tough it can be put in lava and not melt.
Known as the toughest metal on earth.
tooltip.oretopia.chromiumore: §7Is it a shiny rock or another iron copy?
tooltip.oretopia.chromium: §7Mainly used to make stuff shiny but its tough as well.
tooltip.oretopia.chromiumsword: §7Doesn't work as a good sword in real life but this is Minecraft.
tooltip.oretopia.radioumore: §7So toxic it makes Uranium look like regular stone.
tooltip.oretopia.nether_radioumore: §7More common than the regular version of radioum ore. Your welcome for the tip.
tooltip.oretopia.radioum:
§7A metal so radioactive when in contact with human flesh it withers them away.
When mixed with gunpowder it can produce a deadly explosive.
tooltip.oretopia.cobaltore: §7If you mistake this for lapis I think you need glasses.
tooltip.oretopia.cobalt: §7haha funny blue metal just use smth else lol
tooltip.oretopia.oretopiumore: §7'We' at the Oretopia dev team apologize for our lack of ideas.
tooltip.oretopia.oretopium: §7Oh look, the mod creator made an ore with the mod name because he ran out of ideas!
tooltip.oretopia.oretopiumnugget: §7honestly why do you even need this
tooltip.oretopia.rubyblock: §7Now put this on a ring and you might be visible from space.
tooltip.oretopia.rawbaconite: §7Who knew bacon could be generated underground?
tooltip.oretopia.end_corruptiumore: §2§kThe end is maybe near, don't know try mining another one
tooltip.oretopia.titaniumore: §7Probably the most generic ore in the world in terms of tough metals.
tooltip.oretopia.titanium: §7They always say second is the best.
tooltip.oretopia.enderiumore: §7Welp, look like an enderman tried to go mining.
tooltip.oretopia.endershard:
§7A small shard of what used to be an ender pearl.
Can be used to make ender pearls.
tooltip.oretopia.musicdiscshard: §7Oh no, our music disc, its broken!
tooltip.oretopia.end_enderiumore: §7Hope this isn't an enderman crushed into an end stone block.
tooltip.oretopia.ediblebrick: §7Mmmmm yummy... (ingestion may cause side effects of severe injury or death).
tooltip.oretopia.essence: §7Can be used to make gems into powerful stones, but this needs to be enchanted first...
tooltip.oretopia.enchantedessence: §7A gateway to alot of stupidly overpowered items.
tooltip.oretopia.blockofcopper: §7Now use this in one of those 100 meter ethernet cables.
tooltip.oretopia.blockofcobalt: §7Dont know what you would use this for, cool blue block I guess.
tooltip.oretopia.blockoftitanium: §7Build your house with these if you really hate creepers.
tooltip.oretopia.blockoftungsten: §7A cubic inch of pure tungsten would be around 2-3 pounds, how in the world are you carrying this?
tooltip.oretopia.blockofradioum: §7Stand next to it for a minute to simulate a Chernobyl worker.
tooltip.oretopia.blockoforetopium: §7Ran out of ideas, a block will do.
